Remove the ENTIRE cloth folder? WTF guys... All you need to do is remove the long dresses and the slowdown in front of the house is gone. Just remove the files that have CPROS in their name. Like CPROS1L_CPROS1L.aca. And .acml.

And that's if you're even having slowdowns that are that bad. I'm not having any game-breaking slowdowns at all with all the cloth enabled. The only time there is a slowdown below 40fps (GTX460 1GB) is when you're right in front of your house, and that's because the developers made a BUNCH of ladies with their long dresses spawn there. There are no other areas in the demo that are like that. Once you leave that immediate area in front of your house you'll never see another area where they will spawn like that.

But, if you insist on getting rid of it, go ahead and remove the dresses like I explained. Just don't remove the entire folder, that's overkill.
